[#aspect_unit-of-measure]
====== Unit of measure

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description-protocol-shapes:aspect:unit-of-measure`
|Label | Unit of measure
|Definition | The result _MUST_ have `unit:DEG` as the value for `tern:unit`.
|Comment | Result value's unit of measure _MUST_ have the value `unit:DEG`.
